about.title: BotDoSenpai - About Us
about.description: Meet the team behind Bot do Senpai and our mission to spread cuteness on WhatsApp with personalized stickers

about.paragraph1: Since 2020, Bot do Senpai has been making its mark on social media and in the minds of users. Our number has been shared organically thousands of times, featured in viral Twitter posts that reached millions of views, including by users from different countries.
about.paragraph2: We turn messages into unique moments. We combine artificial intelligence and natural language to ensure that every person feels heard, understood, and welcomed ‚Äî all directly on WhatsApp.
about.paragraph3: Every detail of Senpai was created from real interactions ‚Äî we observed what brings people closer, what confuses, and what truly makes a difference. We developed an AI that listens, understands, and responds with empathy and clarity, because we believe that good conversations transform experiences. In the end, our purpose is simple: to make conversations more human, exactly where they happen naturally ‚Äî on your WhatsApp.
about.aDedicatedTeam: A dedicated team committed to turning interactions into incredible experiences.

q1.question: Is the bot safe and legal?
q1.answer: Yes! Our bot is official on WhatsApp, built with the Meta WhatsApp Business API, 100% safe and reliable, following all platform rules.

q2.question: Does the bot support animated stickers?
q2.answer: Yes! You can send short videos or GIFs, and the bot will automatically convert them into animated stickers compatible with WhatsApp.

q3.question: How can I create my stickers?
q3.answer: Simply send an image, photo, video, or GIF to the bot, and it will convert it into a sticker within seconds. No extra apps needed!

q4.question: Do I need to install an app?
q4.answer: No! Everything is done directly on WhatsApp. Just add Senpai and start creating stickers.

q5.question: Who is behind the Sticker Bot?
q5.answer: The Sticker Bot is developed by the Senpai team, specialized in digital solutions and WhatsApp automation.

q6.question: What‚Äôs next for the Sticker Bot?
q6.answer: New features are on the way, such as special effects stickers, integration with custom packs, and much more!

q7.question: Does the bot have a cost?
q7.answer: Currently, the bot offers both free and VIP versions, depending on your needs. Check our subscriptions to learn more.
